faction_profile.name: 진주언가 (Jinju Eon Family / 晉州彥家)

location.geo_political_conflict: Shares the same province (Hebei) with the 'Hebei Peng Family'. Constant territorial and pride disputes.

status.tier: High Tier (Often competes for a spot in the Five Great Families).
status.alignment: Chaotic Neutral or Grey (Due to the taboo of Jiangshi arts).
status.reputation: Known publicly for Fist Arts, but feared secretly for Necromancy.

characteristics.archetype: Necromancer Brawler / Musclehead with Dark Secrets
physique: Born with Divine Strength (Sin-ryeok) similar to the Peng Family.
Giant stature, thick skin, large fists.
Often stereotyped as simple-minded or dull-witted (Muscle-brained).

duality.surface: Orthodox Fist Family (Honest, righteous, albeit rough).
duality.hidden: Practitioners of forbidden Jiangshi Arts (Manipulating corpses, hardening bodies like the undead).

rivalry.dynamic: Fist vs Blade. Both are 'Physical/Strength' families in Hebei. Eon Family is often the perennial #2.

list.name: 대원신공 (Great Origin Divine Art)
list.effect: Hardens skin and meridians. Ultimate mastery leads to 'Blade/Sword Invulnerability'.

list: 벽라환혼신공 (Jade Net Soul Return Divine Art)

list.name: 언가권 (Eon Family Fist)
list.description: Signature Art. Crushes rocks with bare hands. Balanced offense and defense.

list.name: 벽라신권 (Jade Net Divine Fist)
list.description: Manifests Blue Fist Qi (Kwon-gang). High damage but causes recoil damage to the user.

qigong_body_arts.style: Transforming the living body into a weapon (like a Jiangshi)

list.name: 강시공 (Jiangshi Art)
list.effect: Deadens pain receptors and hardens skin. Side effects include loss of sensation and regret in old age.
list.analogy: Extreme conditioning (like Muay Thai shin conditioning) taken to a supernatural level.

list: 구유고혼대법 (Nine Underworlds Lone Soul Great Art)
사신박령대법 (Evil God Spirit Binding Great Art)

narrative_role: The 'Dark Mirror' of the Hebei Peng Family.
A faction that tempts the protagonist with forbidden power (Jiangshi arts).
Comedic relief (Dumb muscleheads) or Horror elements (Undead soldiers), depending on the tone.
